roleset.name: connect back and forth
roleset.note: INTERCONNECT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'interconnect' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 22.2. (from interconnect.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: The products already available are cross-connect systems, used instead of mazes of wiring [*] to interconnect other telecommunications equipment.
